text: No, custom properties for Products and Line Times are not visible in UI

hey- we’re using UTM tags to get users onto our homepage, but when they click on a link to fill out forms and register, after they submit, the origin in HS is “API” and no data is collected about the previously set UTM tags

note : when clicking on a button, it opens in a new tab, therefor getting rid of the tags in the url, but since we do have the pixel on every page, and run `identify` to link the unknown visitor to an email once they submit the form, it should work right?

Hey, <@UMU2YNGAU>. If you’re seeing an _Original Source_ of “Offline Sources” and an _Original source drill-down 1_ of “API,” that suggests the contacts are created via the Contacts API (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/create_contact>) instead of either the `identify` function (which would have the _Original Source_ set according to your `utm` parameters) or the Forms API.

Can you direct message me a test contact record?
